name: BeatStep
description:
I contacted my good friend Bruno and we together composed the audio tracks present in this game. We'll make them available later!

Originally I planned to make 4 levels (lol) with broadly different themes. It turns out I couldn't even bring the first one to 100%, not even 75% (couldn't finish a lot of art that was planned). But it's playable and we're happy with the result. We also got a satisfactory tutorial. The game lacks polishing and I had no time to implement losing, or percentage tracking.

I'm not sure about the difficulty. I feel it's ok, but I might have heard these songs about a thousand times while developing, so it's definitely a point that I might have to come back to. The level itself requires much more precise input than the tutorial.

Check it out and it would be a pleasure if you tell me what you think!

Credits:
